newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - UroQuest, ADAC rated buys.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - UroQuest, ADAC rated buys.

text.p: -- Dillon, Read & Co said analysts Raul Esquivel and Matthew Dodds initiated coverage of UroQuest Medical Inc and ADAC Laboratories with buy ratings.
-- The analysts put a one-year price target of $18-$20 per share on UroQuest, which makes products used to diagnose and manage urological disorders.
-- Dillon, Read was lead underwriter for Uroquest's October initial public offering at $6 a share. Shares were trading flat Wednesday at six.
-- The analysts put a one-year price target of $24-$26 on ADAC, a nuclear medicine company. It was up 1/2 at 19-7/8.
